document.full_text: gov. deval patrick nominated barbara a. lenk to the supreme judicial court of massachusetts, who would be the first openly gay member of the state's highest court if she is confirmed.
document.title: lesbian judge chosen for top massachusetts court
lines_and_colors: gov. deval patrick nominated barbara a. lenk to the supreme judicial court of massachusetts, who would be the first openly gay member of the state's highest court if she is confirmed.
